I'm not texting much anymore - I want to have real conversation - I want to hear your voice. Something has changed in our world today and I want to get back to the ole days of connection....

Happy girls are pretty girls. Happy boys are handsome boys.
Don't tell them anything.. Show them...better yet, show YOU.
Live your life. Mind your business. Be still.
Move on quickly......
Kill negativity. Be abundant in positivity.
Never quit and you will always win.
Be intense about all things that are Good.

Take 100% responsibility for the part you played - never blame others.
